Text: I just finished downloading this but I'm not going to keep it, compression is way too visible. The movies might look ok if you're watching them from a certain distance but considering it's 16GB I was expecting a better quality.

So I've downloaded the PublicHD quadrilogy instead, no problem with that one. I still don't get how a 2hours - 4GB movie can have such a poor compression quality, you just have to look at the paramount logo, right at the start of the movie, to see it.
Terrible quality for a 720p.  Go for PublicHD instead.
